001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;

007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.ChangeCartridgeResponse;
010
011/**
012 * Enters change cartridge mode.
013 *
014 * Precondition: insulin must be suspended.
015 */
016/**
017 * Enters change cartridge mode.
018 *
019 * Precondition: insulin must be suspended.
020 *
021
022 *
023 * <br>
024 *
025 * Request message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.ChangeCartridgeResponse}, opCode -112, size 0
026 *
027 * <br>
028 *
029 * 
030 * <table border='1'>
031 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
032 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>-112</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
033 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>0</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
034 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#REQUEST}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
035 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#CONTROL}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
036 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>signed</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>

039 * </table>
040 */@MessageProps(
041    opCode=-112,
042    size=0,
043    type=MessageType.REQUEST,
044    characteristic=Characteristic.CONTROL,
045    signed=true,
046    modifiesInsulinDelivery=true,
047    response=ChangeCartridgeResponse.class
048)
049public class ChangeCartridgeRequest extends Message { 
050    public ChangeCartridgeRequest() {
051        this.cargo = EMPTY;
052    }
053
054    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
055        raw = removeSignedRequestHmacBytes(raw);
056        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
057        this.cargo = raw;
058        
059    }
060
061    
062}
